app.name: CTI app
app.long_description: The CTI app simulates an integration between Zendesk Support and a CTI partner through Talk Partner Edition APIs. The app let's the user demo a call coming in, the dynamic creation of a call ticket, and dynamic update of the ticket with the call information & recording.
app.installation_instructions: Customise settings, or leave the default and click install. You can always change the settings later on.
